name: Garbage Sailor
description:
A VR game where player tries to clean the ocean by moving through it with a sandal and moves by rowing. Main mechanic of the game is rowing.

Goal is to collect all garbage (plastic bottles) mean while trying not to die by eating food (apple).

Game Developers

Mehmet Altınsoy, Deniz Germen, Arda Şahin

Digital Artists

Kutay Sert, Melisa Atıcı

Sound Designer

Enes Kaynakcı

Game Designer

 Arda Şahin
